subtasks.description: Implement ETL script invoked through MCP Python
Consume Redis Streams for xAPI statements
Write processed data to Postgres via MCP DB
Create test suite for ETL streaming

completion_criteria: ETL script processes xAPI statements from Redis Streams
Data written to Postgres via MCP DB server
All missing functions added: redis_client, mcp_db_client, mcp_python_client, process_statement, write_to_mcp_db
HTTP client attribute access issues fixed

real_world_testing.notes: MCP servers now available from b.01 completion
real_world_testing.validation_notes: Ready for real-world testing with MCP Python and MCP DB servers

agent_handoff.handoff_notes: Real-world testing required now that MCP servers are available. Test ETL streaming with actual Redis Streams and MCP DB integration.
